sql.queryUpdate: SELECT BANK_ACCOUNT_ID ,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,BANK_ACCOUNT_NUM ,BANK_BRANCH_ID ,SET_OF_BOOKS_ID ,CURRENCY_CODE ,CONTACT_FIRST_NAME ,CONTACT_MIDDLE_NAME ,CONTACT_LAST_NAME ,CONTACT_TITLE ,CONTACT_AREA_CODE ,CONTACT_PHONE ,MIN_CHECK_AMOUNT ,MAX_CHECK_AMOUNT ,ASSET_CODE_COMBINATION_ID ,BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE ,MAX_OUTLAY ,ACCOUNT_TYPE ,ZERO_AMOUNTS_ALLOWED ,ORG_ID FROM AP_BANK_ACCOUNTS_ALL WHERE LAST_UPDATE_DATE > ?
